text: Ayorinde Fasanmi (27 September 1925Pa Ayo Fasanmi: Afenifere National Leader dies at 94 | Pulse Nigeria â€“ 29 July 2020) was a Nigerian pharmacist and politician. He was born in Iye Ekiti, Nigeria. He joined the Unity Party of Nigeria in 1978 and was a candidate in the Ondo State gubernatorial primary election but lost. In 1983, he was elected member of the Federal House of Representatives representing Ondo North. He later served as member of the Board of Directors of the Old Western Nigeria Housing Corporation. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Nigerian businesspeople Category:Nigerian politicians
title: Ayo Fasanmi
